PASSWORD_REGEXP: Your :attribute should contain at-least 1 Uppercase, 1 Lowercase, 1 Numeric and 1 special character
ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE: Your email is not verified before you make login verify your email by clicking the link from email which you received when you registered with us.
ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE_ADMIN: Website admin has deactivated your account
UNDER_REVIEW: Your store information are under review by Website Admin. As soon as your store will be approved you will receive a notification for same.
